thread.section_title: Car Mats UK Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Car Mats UK | www.carmats-uk.com | 6 of 587
thread.title: Craig D
thread.title_full: Car Mats UK reviewed by Craig D

author: Craig D
title: Craig D
text:
I was looking for floor mats for my new car, the website was easy to navigate and it was clear which model and the year of manufacture I was ordering to ensure that I had the correct size / fit.
The mats are a very high quality and finished as specified.
Delivery was prompt without any issues.
I would definitely use Car Mats UK again in the future.
